sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEMPK', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PROC_SEQ0', 4, '공정SEQ', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEMPK', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PROC_GUBN', 5, '공정구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_MATT_CODE', 6, '재질구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_SHAP_CODE', 7, '소재형태', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PROD_CODE', 8, '적용부품', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_2CUT_CODE', 9, '2차 CUT', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_BELL_CODE', 10, 'BELLOWS', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_EXPN_CODE', 11, '확관율', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_SQUA_CODE', 12, '4각 PIPE규격', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_MAKE_YN', 13, '조관여부', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_DOIL_YN', 14, '오일제거', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_DIA0_MIN0', 15, '제품외경_MIN (초과)', 'NUMBER', '10', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_DIA0_MAX0', 16, '제품외경_MAX(이하)', 'NUMBER', '10', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PROC_NAME', 17, '가공명', 'VARCHAR', '50', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_NET0_CYTM', 18, 'NET CT', 'NUMBER', '10', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_NET0_COEF1', 19, 'NET CT 계수1', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_NET0_COEF2', 20, 'NET CT 계수2', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_NET0_COEF3', 21, 'NET CT 계수3', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_NET0_COEF4', 22, 'NET CT 계수4', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_CAVT', 23, 'CVT', 'NUMBER', '10', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_CAVT_COEF1', 24, 'CVT 계수1', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_CAVT_COEF2', 25, 'CVT 계수2', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PREP_HOUR', 26, '준비시간', 'NUMBER', '7', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PRSN_CNT1', 27, '인원1', 'NUMBER', '7', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_PRSN_CNT2', 28, '인원2', 'NUMBER', '7', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_LOTQ', 29, 'LOT', 'NUMBER', '10', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_MCHH_CODE', 30, '기계장비코드', 'VARCHAR', '20', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_APPL_GUBN', 31, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_REMK', 32, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_UPDT_CMAN', 33, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_UPDT_DATE', 34, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_INIT_CMAN', 35, '작성자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWP', 'PIWP_INIT_DATE', 36, '작성일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:48', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBPIWP ( PIWP_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,PIWP_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PIWP_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,PIWP_PROC_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PIWP_PROC_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_MATT_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_SHAP_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_PROD_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_2CUT_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_BELL_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_EXPN_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_SQUA_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_MAKE_YN VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_DOIL_YN VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_DIA0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,PIWP_DIA0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,PIWP_PROC_NAME VARCHAR2(50) ,PIWP_NET0_CYTM NUMBER(10, 2) ,PIWP_NET0_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWP_NET0_COEF2 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWP_NET0_COEF3 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWP_NET0_COEF4 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWP_CAVT NUMBER(10, 0) ,PIWP_CAVT_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWP_CAVT_COEF2 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWP_PREP_HOUR NUMBER(7, 2) ,PIWP_PRSN_CNT1 NUMBER(7, 2) ,PIWP_PRSN_CNT2 NUMBER(7, 2) ,PIWP_LOTQ NUMBER(10, 0) ,PIWP_MCHH_CODE VARCHAR2(20) ,PIWP_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PIWP_REMK VARCHAR2(200) ,PIWP_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWP_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBPIWP_PK PRIMARY KEY( PIWP_CORP_CODE ,PIWP_STND_GUBN ,PIWP_STND_DEGR ,PIWP_PROC_SEQ0 ,PIWP_PROC_GUBN ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
